attributes.action: introduce legislation to change the laws of this country so that general elections are held every four years on the same date and an individual who has been Prime Minister for one period of four years cannot, by law, be Prime Minister for a second period of four years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Our political system has been so corrupted by self interest and party politics that this country is no longer a democracy.  Party politicking at the heart of government where the prime minister and ministers work only to keep themselves in power, regardless of the condition of the country or the cost their actions have upon society, must stop.  This change to the british electoral rules is the only thing which is going to stop megalomaniacs of the likes of Blair and Brown.
